thread.section_title: Kourtney Kardashian News and Instagram Photos from KUWTK Star | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: juggles Reign and $1,910 LV purse
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian juggles Reign and $1,910 LV purse | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: juggles Reign and $1,910 LV purse
text:
It's the perfect size for a toddler to carry.
But at a whopping $1,910, this Louis Vuitton backpack is more likely to belong to his mother Kourtney , than little Reign.
Still, as any experienced parent knows, travelling with children isn't easy - and the designer purse is surely stuffed with amusements for the two-year-old.
Baby's first Louis Vuitton! Kourtney Kardashian juggles son Reign and a mini $1,910 purse as they jet home from Costa Rica on Monday
Kourtney rocked the monogram infrarouge version of the Palm Springs Backpack by Louis Vuitton as she jetted out of Costa Rica on Monday.
The mother-of-three had her extended family in toe - it was a working holiday, with the gang busy filming Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
As always when on camera, Kourtney was dolled up to the nines in designer goods.
Pricey: Kourtney rocked the monogram infrarouge version of the Palm Springs Backpack by Louis Vuitton
Her $1,980 trousers were fresh from the latest Gucci collection - indeed the matching $3,600 jacket was worn by KellyAnne Conway to President Donald Trump's inauguration.
As for Reign, he was dressed in a denim shirt and uber fashionable (but rather impractical) white ripped jeans.
Kourtney had tied the tot's hair in a hipster-ish updo, and he wore a gold chain around his neck.
Fancy: Her $1,980 trousers were fresh from the latest Gucci collection - indeed the matching $3,600 jacket was worn by KellyAnne Conway to President Donald Trump's inauguration
While Kourtney was the model mother on Monday, she has certainly not being holding back during her trip.
The reality star has posted a series of naked pictures to Snapchat, along with plenty of bikini Instagrams.
Along with Reign, Kourtney also travelled with Mason, seven, Penelope, four, and their father - her on-again off-again boyfriend Scott Disick.
Racy: While Kourtney was the model mother on Monday, she has certainly not being holding back during her trip
Kourtney and Scott, 33, split in 2016 after she became frustrated with his party-loving lifestyle, but he has since made a concerted effort to win her back.
The reality star has managed to curb his drinking and become more self-disciplined as he's tried to convince Kourtney to rekindle their romance.
However Kourtney remains happily single for the time being.
Family trip: Along with Reign, Kourtney also travelled with Mason, seven, Penelope, four, and their father - her on-again off-again boyfriend Scott Disick
